column1: ประทับเวลา
column2:
How often do you ride a bike in Taipei?
(您在台北多常騎腳踏車？)
column3:
What is the main reason you ride a bicycle?
(您騎自行車的主要原因是什麼？ )
column4:
What kind of bicycle do you usually use?
(您通常使用什麼類型的自行車？)
column5:
What time of day do you usually ride a bicycle?
(您通常在一天中的什麼時間騎自行車？)
column6:
Which places or routes do you often use when riding your bicycle?
(您常常騎自行車時會經過哪些地方或路線？)
column7:
Have you ever been involved in a bike accident in Taipei?
(您曾經在台北發生過自行車事故嗎？)
column8:
If yes, how many times has it happened in the past year?
(如果是的話，在過去一年中發生過幾次？)
column9:
If yes, where did the accident happen?
(如果是，事故發生在哪裡？)
column10:
What was the cause of the accident?
(事故發生的原因是什麼？)
column11:
Did you report the accident to the authorities?
(您有向有關部門報告事故嗎？)
column12:
Did you get hurt in the accident?
(您在事故中受傷了嗎？)
column13:
On a scale from 1 to 5, how safe do you feel while cycling in Taipei?
(在 1 到 5 的範圍內，您覺得在台北騎自行車有多安全？)
column14:
What are your biggest concerns when cycling in Taipei?
(在台北騎自行車時，您最大的顧慮是什麼？)
column16:
Do you know about any bike-friendly routes or safe paths in Taipei?
(您知道台北有哪些對自行車友善的路線或安全的路徑嗎？)
column17:
What changes do you think would make cycling safer in Taipei?
(您認為哪些改變能使在台北騎自行車更安全？)
column18:
If there were a navigation app that suggests the safest bike routes using accident data, would you use it or not?
(如果有一個導航應用程式，可以利用事故數據建議最安全的自行車路線，您會使用嗎？)
column19:
What features would you like to have in a bike safety navigation app?
(您希望自行車安全導航應用程式具備哪些功能？)
column20: Where are you from?(你來自哪裡？)
column21: What gender are you?( 你的性別)
column22: How old are you?(你幾歲了？)
